data.title: FS:Dual Mobo, 1800xp->mp, 2500+xp ->mp, ss50
data.meta_description: Well, I'm going back to school so I have to clear out some stuff. Buyer pays actual shipping and I am open to offers. Photos available. Will accept non-cc...
data.text:
Well, I'm going back to school so I have to clear out some stuff. Buyer pays actual shipping and I am open to offers. Photos available. Will accept non-cc paypal. Usually ship via UPS but will go USPS if need/want.

My heatware is ibilisi and my ebay is ibilisi.

MSI K7D-L : $135
This is just back from an RMA. Includes I/O Shield and cables if you need a couple, just let me know.

2x1800xp modded to MP and unlocked:
$40 ea.
AGKGA
AGNGA
These ran fine on my MSI for ~1 year.

2xXP-TMC : $25 ea.
Original packing.

2xBarton 2500+ XP -> MP enabled: $65 ea.
Both are AQXEA.
These ran great for 6mo. on my previous K7D with the xp-tmc. Never overclocked.


Shuttle SS50 Mini Barebones system: $150.
This was used for a week of testing. Has everything in the box. Would make a sweet linux system. The one with 2xPCI slots.

Nexland WaveBase : $80
This has IPSec/PPTP passthrough, SDSL compatible. Company was purchased by Symantec. Not really sure how to price it. Make an offer.
